sn7.2:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn7.2:4.3: “bhāradvājagotto kira brāhmaṇo samaṇassa gotamassa santike agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito”ti kupito anattamano yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.2:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosati paribhāsati.
sn7.2:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā akkosakabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.2:5.2: “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, brāhmaṇa, api nu kho te āgacchanti mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā atithiyo”ti?
sn7.2:5.3: “Appekadā me, bho gotama, āgacchanti mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā atithiyo”ti.
sn7.2:5.4: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, brāhmaṇa, api nu tesaṃ anuppadesi khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sāyanīyaṃ vā”ti?
sn7.2:5.5: “Appekadā nesāhaṃ, bho gotama, anuppademi khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sāyanīyaṃ vā”ti.
sn7.2:5.6: “Sace kho pana te, brāhmaṇa, nappaṭiggaṇhanti, kassa taṃ hotī”ti?
sn7.2:5.7: “Sace te, bho gotama, nappaṭiggaṇhanti, amhākameva taṃ hotī”ti.
sn7.2:5.8: “Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, yaṃ tvaṃ amhe anakkosante akkosasi, arosente rosesi, abhaṇḍante bhaṇḍasi, taṃ te mayaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhāma.
sn7.2:6.1: Yo kho, brāhmaṇa, akkosantaṃ paccakkosati, rosentaṃ paṭiroseti, bhaṇḍantaṃ paṭibhaṇḍati, ayaṃ vuccati, brāhmaṇa, sambhuñjati vītiharatīti.
sn7.2:6.2: Te mayaṃ tayā neva sambhuñjāma na vītiharāma.
sn7.2:6.5: “Bhavantaṃ kho gotamaṃ sarājikā parisā evaṃ jānāti:
sn7.2:6.7: Atha ca pana bhavaṃ gotamo kujjhatī”ti.
sn7.2:7.1: * “Akkodhassa kuto kodho,
sn7.2:11.1: Evaṃ vutte, akkosakabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.2:11.3: esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn7.2:11.4: Labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
sn7.2:12.1: Alattha kho akkosakabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
sn7.2:12.2: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā akkosakabhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
sn7.2:12.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṃ—
sn7.2:12.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn7.2:12.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn7.2:12.6: Aññataro ca panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṃ ahosīti.
